title: Apple Mac Studio with M1 Ultra review: Size doesnâ€™t matter
content:
Apple’s new Mac Studio has the footprint of a Mac Mini that’s about two and a half times as tall. Speaking in terms of volume and most of its dimensions, it’s smaller than any Intel-powered PC with desktop dedicated graphics. It’s pretty obvious when you’re looking at it, but it’s not so obvious when you’re

description: Apple's Mac Studio is the most powerful computer that it's ever made, and Apple Silicon continues to push new boundaries in computing.
